price: Hakika wale walio amini,na wakatenda mema, na wakanyenyekea kwa Mola wao Mlezi, hao ndio watu wa Peponi, na humo watadumu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَخۡبَتُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Bila ya shaka wale wenye kumuamini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mitume wake, na wakatenda a'mali njema, na nyoyo zao zikanyenyekea na zikatua kuikubali hukumu ya Mola wao Mlezi, hao ndio wanao stahiki kuingia Peponi na kudumu humo milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wa-akhbatū ilā rabbihim ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
